pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Second-Generation p-Values and Associated Measures // Computation of second-generation p-values as described in Blume et al. (2018) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0188299 and Blume et al. (2019) doi:10.1080/00031305.2018.1537893. There are additional functions which provide power and type I error calculations, create graphs (particularly suited for large-scale inference usage), and a function to estimate false discovery rates based on second-generation p-value inference.
